Title: Relates to the alienation of certain parkland in the town of Brookhaven
Summary: Authorizes alienation of certain parkland in the town of Brookhaven, Suffolk county and the lease of such land for a wireless communication tower, and an easement for access and utilities.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the town of Brookhaven, county of Suffolk, to alienate and discontinue the use of certain parklands
